entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/NaN/intrinsic_cs_ro/intrinsic_cs_ro.dll #88451
    8.0.0
  • Unexpected error message - The configuration of 'ExceptionMarshalling' and 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' on method 'Demo.MySafeHandle' is invalid. #88448
    8.0.0
  • code suggestion comment is wrong #88443
  • MSB4018 The "ConvertDllsToWebCil" task failed unexpectedly #88442
  • Issue with .NET MAUI in VS 2022 #88441
  • Marshalling generator pipeline should unmarshal / marshal parameters into local variables and assign just before return #88438
    8.0.0
  • Wierd Task cancellation token behavior #88434
  • Multiple documented members of System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnmanagedType are marked EditorBrowsable(Never) #88431
  • Can runtime created type using Reflection.Emit be deleted or updated #88429
  • Cannot modify the static field of dependent module on dynamically-loaded library using hostfxr(DNNE) #88427
  • 1sec Long Pause (stop-the-world) on Gen1 GC #88426
  • Ensure System.Text.Json SG diagnostics don't use locations from external assemblies #88424
    8.0.0
  • SPMI: superpmi-collect consistently fails to fully collect crossgen2 scenarios #88423
  • R2R app w/ Mono runtime crashes with `MonoStackFrame not found` #88419
  • Sporadic failures in RegexMatchTests test cases on s390x #88418
  • Microsoft.VisualBasic.Strings.InStr with CompareMethod.Text is 10x slower in .NET 7 than in .NET Framework 4.8 #88416
  • DOTNET_JitDisasm sometimes generates garbled output #88413
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ConcurrentQueue.TryDequeue with condition #88412
  • Once HttpClient.DefaultProxy is accessed, it will not be updated again. #88409
  • System.Array.Copy() getting slow in background on Windows 11 #88407
  • [iOS][MacCatalyst] error: mono_coop_cond_broadcast Cannot transition thread from STATE_BLOCKING with DO_BLOCKING #88405
    8.0.0
  • Analyzer proposal: Detect wrong CancellationToken being used when multiple tokens are available in scope #88403
  • Minor documentation error for `IFloatingPoint<TSelf>.Round(TSelf, int, MidpointRounding)` #88401

Closed

  • Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces is missing API documentation #87722
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add bson format to .net #88422
  • [API Proposal]: Allow DoesConsoleSupportAnsi to be overridden on Windows by environment variable #88236
    8.0.0
  • `impImportCnsTreeFromBuffer` can create incorrectly typed `TYP_DOUBLE` trees #88315
    8.0.0
  • Inefficient codegen with struct consisting of 2 SIMD vectors. #83749
    8.0.0
  • NativeRuntimeEventSource generates a large manifest that is never used #83127
    8.0.0
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Possible GC Hole from `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder.SourceGeneration.Tests` test run #85632
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/Devirtualization/Comparer_get_Default/Comparer_get_Default.dll #87391
    8.0.0
  • PGO work planned for .NET 8 #74873
    8.0.0
  • Profile Synthesis Work Items #82964
    8.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.EventLogMessagesTests crash #83915
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_33972/Runtime_33972/Runtime_33972.cmd #88361
  • Proposed tasks to improve the OOB nuget build process in servicing branches #81974
    8.0.0
  • Libraries Infrastructure and Tools work planned for .NET 8 #77792
    8.0.0
  • Enable TFM filtering for runtime's source-build #82298
    8.0.0
  • Verify `TarWriter.TarEntry(fileName, entryName)` behavior if user owner and device numbers cannot be retrieved #81144
    8.0.0
  • Directories created by extracting from a tar file do not have timestamps set #74398
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CreateAddAndClear<Int32> #84029
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `System.Boolean` and `System.String` should implement `ISpanFormattable` #88408
  • [Feature Request]: Add special case for `System.ValueTuple` to `System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer` #88414
  • Add a `JsonTypeInfoResolver.WithModifier` extension method #86440
    8.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Unknown format in import in System.Security.Cryptography.Tests #88050
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ConcurrentQueue.TryDequeue with condition #88411
  • Frozen collection construction performance #87964
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: segfault in mono-aot-cross for `System.Collections.Tests` #88358
    8.0.0
  • When using X509KeyStorageFlags.EphemeralKeySet, AllowPlaintextExport is missing in Export policy, and we will Exception when invoke ExportPkcs8PrivateKey #76449
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Extend `JsonIncludeAttribute` and `JsonConstructorAttribute` support to internal and private members #88452
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix diagnostic message #88450
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Have the loop hoister take into account that TYP_SIMD32/64 must be spilled across a call boundary #88449
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that NI_Vector_Dot is always handled as TYP_SIMD #88447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable use of certains R2R data structures in the DAC #88446
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update branding to 7.0.10 #88445
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.21 #88444
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] Fix sorting custom attributes in ILStrip #88437
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [mini] Enter GC Unsafe mode in handle_signal_exception #88436
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add some xml comments #88433
    area-Meta
  • Add consultants for some extensions areas #88430
    area-Meta
  • [MONO] Incorrect timestamps for perf events #88428
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix which path is taken in Enumerable.Select for empty partition #88425
    area-System.Linq
  • Print variable types when dumping the output #88420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add public MethodInvoker and ConstructorInvoker classes #88415
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix DevDiv_718151 test #88404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Enable Regex to use SearchValues<string> in compiled / source generator TryFindNextStartingPosition #88400
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Add docs for AsyncInterfaces #88432
    needs-area-label
  • Dedup Task.WhenAll non-generic and generic implementations #88154
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Make DoesConsoleSupportAnsi respect DOTNET_SYSTEM_CONSOLE_ALLOW_ANSI_COLOR_REDIRECTION #88241
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add gtNewGenericCon #88440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix sorting custom attributes in ILStrip #88435
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Fix Codespaces prebuild after CMake upgrade and set policy in Mono #88410
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix AVX512 moves on X86 #88421
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Compute BB weights with higher precision, use tolerance in if-conversion #88385
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix InlineArrayAttribute access on big-endian platforms #88417
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix SIMD node DOT retType #88363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Inline more helpers in RegexParser #88392
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Suppress System.Drawing.Common dependency from System.Windows.Extensions #88157
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [iOS] Add temp cindex attribute to build on xcode 15 #88261
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Propagate multi-reg-index for upper-vector-restore ref positions #88380
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Tar: set directory modification times while extracting. #88231
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Permit trailing data after PKCS12 on iOS #88340
    area-System.Security, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2214652 #88399
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement JsonTypeInfoResolver.WithAddedModifier #88255
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add vectorization for Vector4 #87822
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve non-SIMD block copy/init codegen #88393
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add clr.tools subset to runtime-community #88160
    area-Infrastructure, arch-s390x
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (6/6) #88093
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • change regex options tests to extension method #88366
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Bump to libc++ without libatomic linkage #88402
    needs-area-label
  • Move IMeterFactory to System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource #88302
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Fix another crash when using opaque pointers. #88397
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono] Respect KeepNativeSymbols when building cross compilers. #88398
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • NativeAOT Watson changes for crashes/unhandled exceptions #88273
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not say the wrong default behavior for blittable arrays in ComInterfaceGenerator warning #88212
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [libs][Unix][perf] Lazily initialize TimeZoneInfo names and order GetSystemTimeZones by Ids #88368
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Update missing runtime/framework install URL to use host RID #88359
    area-Host
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable reading process environment variables in EventPipe #87771
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • EventPipe support for ProcessInfo #87562
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix unsafe walking of DacEnumerableHash #88063
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring back old array enumerator code #88371
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix TLS resume with HttpClientHandler on Linux #88214
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Speed up KeyAnalyser #87590
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Tar: Fix PAX regression when handling the size of really long unseekable data streams #88280
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Rewrite DbBuffer Read/Write methods with stackalloc #88395
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Performance improvements for Random.Shuffle() #83305
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [Android] Add NdkToolFinder task & Fix up AOT app build #88210
    area-Build-mono
  • [TEST] http metrics sandbox #88137
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Disallow Options source gen produce diagnostics from outside the compilation #88396
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Update testing.md #88364
    area-Meta
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Update binding generator to do case-insensitive config-key/property name matching, & make some formatting improvements #88338
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Use wider look-up table while searching chars on Arm64 #88183
    arch-arm64, area-System.Buffers, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - some refactoring, and rationalizing #88357
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Using stackalloc instead of new byte[x] on Streams #88303
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals when widening #87141
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Intrinsify Array GetArrayDataReference for SZ arrays #87374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Work around for Android builds using GCC for cross compiler native tools build #88345
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix JSON required read-only properties used as parametrized ctor #78152
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix CoreCLR tests build with skipmanaged option #88321
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix .cfi directives for ThePreStub #88259
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Annotate Microsoft.CSharp library code for DynamicCode #82747
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [WIP] Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range initialization, take 2 #87992
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fixing a concurrency bug in ManagedWebSocket which may cause memory corruption #87966
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix floating point #88311
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][llvm] Remove support for llvm versions before 14.x. #88346
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to use FileSystemWatcher to check if file copying and moving is complete on linux? #33782

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #33811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP: Add name argument for dotnet new #33810
    untriaged, Area-Templates
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #33808
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #33806
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33805
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch the VM image of the macOS #33783
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Use Task.CompletedTask #24462
  • Update branding to 6.0.413 #33801
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.307 #33803
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.316 #33800
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.110 #33802
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.121 #33799
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2214624 #33787
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Replace rollForward in tools runtimeconfig #24817
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Disable JsonSerializer.IsReflectionEnabledByDefault on `PublishTrimmed=true` #33757
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Containers: fix some auth issues. #33753
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Validate existing suppressions and remove unnecessary suppressions when re-generating suppression files #32964
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add explicit System.Text.Json dependency #33618
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix printed version for APICompat.Tool and GenAPI.Tool #33619
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Use install state in workload manifest provider #33643
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Proposal for `readonly` parameters #7322
  • Collection literals: create methods #7320

Merged

  • Update README.md #7323

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression in VS 17.7 Preview 1: false positive for CS8602 after call to Assert.IsNotNull (NUnit). No false positive in VS 17.6. #68885
  • The "Add missing using directives on paste" option doesn't respect global usings #68884
  • Enable navigation to decompiled sources not working #68883
  • CS1654 for no obvious reason #68882
  • IDE0004 false positive for value tuple with nullable reference type #68881
  • Rename feature (CRTL + R + R) does not work as intended in an edge case #68880
  • Allow inheritdoc expansion when using `ISymbol.GetDocumentationCommentXml` #68879
  • .editorconfig GUI editor saves changes to .editorconfig using CRLF instead of preserving current line endings #68878
  • Analyzer "Apply unused value preferences" doesn't produce working code in VB with option Explicit On #68877
  • Code generated using code snippets does not match parentheses correctly inside #68876
  • Quick action to adjust namespace changes code #68875
  • Can't trigger inline method from the method itself, and inlining can break compilation #68874

Closed

  • Feature 'document highlights' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #68328
    17.8
  • Analyzer config discovery doesn't work when all source files are generated #66051
    Backlog
  • A csproj project w/o any local .cs files can fail to load .editorconfig #67660
    Backlog
  • Bug in NormalizeWhitespace - doc comments #68857
    17.8
  • $" quotes do not auto-complete in many scenarios #68861
  • [BUG] Analyzers and code fixes not working in C# Dev Kit? #68588
    17.7 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • [Infra] Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing to 1.1.2-beta1.23323.1 #68888
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • BindRefExpression - bind expression in error recovery mode. #68887
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge features/CollectionLiterals into Main #68886
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Lookahead parsing for collection exprs vs. local functions. #68807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Doc how to test in VSCode #68733
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Update Telemetry version to 17.7.57 #68865
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Allow function breakpoints before module symbols are loaded #67600
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Fix crash in interpolation handling #68845
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Simplify and make consistent query-context tracking in the parser #68757
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disallow applying `RequiresLocation` and `Out` attributes to `ref readonly` parameters in source #68871
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Fix ordering issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68490
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Filter `RequiresLocationAttribute` from `ref readonly` parameters #68870
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Warn on shadowing primary constructor parameter by a member from base #68864
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Enhance the SARIF v2 log to report analyzer execution time #68607
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49237
    8.0-preview7
  • Unexpected RST after client FIN for non-chunked responses #49236
  • Perf regression: caching #49232
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #49231
  • Consider removing RazorComponentResult #49227
    8.0-rc1
  • Adding a constructor to a controller breaks hot reloading (dotnet watch) #49226
  • Ability to check for JavaScript runtime support #49225
    Backlog
  • Explore switching MultipartReaderStream to use IndexOf #49223
  • Blazor RemoteAuthenticatorView stuck in "Completing login..." after "No matching state found" error #49221
    Backlog
  • Expose a StateChanged event to notify so that the client UI can accuretly display the current connection state. #49219
  • The recommended api template display name is ASP.NET Core API APP #49218
  • WebApi template remove UseMinimalAPIs option #49217
  • Change LogLevel in runtime for single request #49216
  • API and Blazor template missing tags #49215
    8.0-preview7
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plaintext #49213
  • Identity is not null-checked #49211
    Backlog

Closed

  • Blazor .NET to JS interop never returning data back #49230
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plainTextEmptyFilter #49190
  • Perf regression: json #49214
  • In blazor SSR, when setting @attribute [RenderModeServer], cascading parameter Task<AuthenticationState> always is null #48927
    8.0-preview7
  • Design proposal: solution for cascading values into interactive pages #49104
    8.0-preview7
  • BLAZOR - Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'createElementNS') In Blazor #49173
  • [Blazor] Enhanced form navigation does not seem to handle collections correctly. #49207
    8.0-preview7
  • Blazor antiforgery #46987
    8.0-preview7
  • Blazor WASM InputFile OnChange doesnt invoke when input file is no longer selected #49148
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: mvc #49198
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #49208
  • Perf regression: https, plaintext #49209

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49233
    area-middleware
  • Update area-owners.md #49229
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2214810 #49228
    area-mvc
  • build-ops update sdk to nightly #49222
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.21 #49234
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.21
  • Update branding to 7.0.10 #49235
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.10
  • Use SearchValues in PathString #49117
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7
  • Root-level cascading values + CascadingAuthenticationState at root #49204
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Adds support for updating the parameter names as well as generating names inside child components #49224
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Cleanup blazor wasm template #49188
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Add support for antiforgery #49108
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Fix endpoints not being available in debug view until after WebApplication starts #49103
    area-hosting, 8.0-preview7
  • Add RequestServices to HttpContext debugging #49212
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Fix Http MinimalSample #49174
    area-runtime
  • Add public metadata types. #49068
    area-runtime
  • Use SearchValues in HostString #49114
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #49034
    area-infrastructure
  • Add EmptyContent parameter to Virtualize component #49185
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Support updating/changing the binding prefix #49199
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "playsinline" attribute not working in HTML5 video tag for iOS #16013
  • NU1202 Package Microsoft.Maui.Graphics 7.0.86 is not compatible with net7.0-android #16009
    Backlog
  • [ VS & .NET 8 ] MAUI Android/iOS causes error and can't be built, .csproj file can't be shown #16008
    Backlog
  • Align text displays differently on Windows Machine and Android #16006
    Backlog
  • Android Overview Page and the iOS App Switcher page icon problem maui #16005
  • iOS Frame/Carousel/Image does not work on iOS #16003
  • In maui, when using stepper to combine Entry and Editor, clicking the + sign does not respond and the value does not change #16002
  • Crashes in apps built with visual studio 17.6.* #16001
    .NET 8
  • "Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Page' to type 'Microsoft.Maui.IContentView'." #16000
  • XamlC error XFC0000 prevents launch #15999
  • Android app crash in release Mode #15997
  • [MAUI] RefreshView details page does not load images. #15994
  • [MAUI]Text appears overlapping on RefreshView page. #15993

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • deps.json is not generating Visual studio 2022 v 17.6.4 #31186
  • DbContext get DbSet for interface (DbSet<interface>) #31185

Closed

  • EF Core 6 and newer scaffolding skips foreign keys on tables with multiple references #31169
    8.0.0
  • How to change the primary key column name for a derived type using TPT inheritance strategy #31189
  • EntityFramework Migration Generation Produces Unexpected Index Column #31187
  • Why does the connection close after executing a query or savechanges. DbConnection. State is closed #31151
  • EFCore allow binary serialisation of built model to speed up subsequent restarts #30716
  • Generates invalid SQL Server migrations script for computed stored with specific collation #31177
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • stackalloc for BytesToDecimal #31190
  • update SDK to nightly #31188

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.21 #31191
  • Update branding to 7.0.10 #31192
  • Fix FK duplicate detection bug #31181
    community-contribution
  • Fix migration for SQL Server persisted column with collation #31182

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31193
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Use IDbSetCache.GetSets() when checking for resettable services #31154
  • [release/7.x] Disable trigger enumeration on Azure Synapse Analytics, where triggers are not supported #31036
    Servicing-approved, community-contribution, 7.0.9
